category.name: zoo.window.confirmation
category.item: To unlock this zoo, you need to be at level %level%. Or unlock it immediately for %zooDollar% zoodollars.

You need to be at level %level% to unlock this zoo.

category.name: zoo.window.confirmation.gift
category.item: You haven't selected your 5 friends yet! If you continue, your gifts will be lost. That would be a shame... Do you still want to continue?
